amendment.description: To provide relief to mobilized military reservists from certain Federal agricultural loan obligations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3202 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3202 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Daschle. (consideration: CR 6/18/2004 S6971-6980; text: CR 6/18/2004 S6972) To provide relief to mobilized military reservists from certain Federal agricultural loan obligations.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3202 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3202 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Daschle.
